name: Global Scramble
description: If you're a word nerd and a geography buff, Global Scramble is the addictive app for you! Unscramble a country name and then select its scrambled capital city. Free, ad-free, and playable offline, Global Scramble is the perfect choice for when you're waiting in a long line at an airport, be that in IPSRA, CRFNAE or TWOAAT, AADCNA.
